abstract: Gescard F Isnora and Michael Carey, New York City police officers involved in the 2006 shooting that killed Sean Bell, are both fighting to keep their jobs while defending their actions in departmental trial; two other officers, Marc Cooper and Michael Oliver, have agreed to retire.
snippet: Two officers involved in the shooting that killed Sean Bell in 2006 are offering to retire; two other officers in the shooting defended their actions at a departmental trial that began on Monday.
lead_paragraph: Two officers involved in the shooting that killed Sean Bell in 2006 are offering to retire; two other officers in the shooting defended their actions at a departmental trial that began on Monday.

headline.main: Police Trial Begins for Officers in Bell Shooting; Two Offer to Retire
headline.print_headline: Police Trial Begins for Officers in Bell Shooting; Two Offer to Retire
headline.seo: Police Trial Begins for Officers in Sean Bell Shooting; Two Offer to Retire
